If you are struggling with any mental health issues or experiencing any distressing thoughts, please seek professional help from a licensed therapist or counselor. They can provide you with adequate support and guidance to manage your emotions and stay safe.

Remember, you are not alone in this fight, and there are many resources available to help you navigate through challenging situations. Reach out and seek help when needed.
